briefTitle: Bimatoprost for the Treatment of Eyebrow Hypotrichosis

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

-Adult participants with eyebrow hypotrichosis (inadequate eyebrow growth).

Exclusion Criteria:

* Patients with disease, infection, or abnormality of the eyebrow area
* Patients with permanent eyebrow loss due to over-grooming

outcomeMeasures.title: Percentage of Participants With at Least a 1-Grade Increase (Improvement) in the 4-Point Global Eyebrow Assessment (GEBA) Scale
outcomeMeasures.description: The physician evaluated eyebrow fullness using the 4-point GEBA Scale where: 1=very sparse, 2=sparse, 3=full and 4=very full. The percentage of participants with at least a 1-grade increase from Baseline is reported.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in Eyebrow Fullness as Measured Using Digital Monitoring System Image Analysis (DMSIA)
outcomeMeasures.description: Photographs were taken of the eyebrows. Eyebrow fullness was measured by DMSIA for both eyes and averaged. Eyebrow fullness was reported in millimeters squared (mm\^2). A positive change from Baseline indicated fuller eyebrows (improvement).

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in Eyebrow Darkness as Measured Using DMSIA
outcomeMeasures.description: Photographs were taken of the eyebrows. Eyebrow darkness (intensity) was measured by DMSIA for both eyes and averaged. Eyebrow darkness was reported in intensity units. A negative change from Baseline indicated darker eyebrows (improvement).

outcomeMeasures.title: Percentage of Participants With 'Very Satisfied' or 'Mostly Satisfied' in Eyebrow Satisfaction Scale (ESS) Item #6
outcomeMeasures.description: ESS Item #6 measured the participant's satisfaction with eyebrow treatment: "Overall, how satisfied are you with the way the eyebrow treatment makes your eyebrows look right now?" using a 5-point scale where: 1=very satisfied, 2=mostly satisfied, 3=neither dissatisfied nor satisfied, 4=mostly dissatisfied and 5=very dissatisfied. The percentage of participants 'very satisfied' or 'mostly satisfied' is reported.
